forum.content:
How long? How long must we sing this song?

1972年北愛爾蘭與英國之間政治上的衝突，造成的流血暴力鎮壓，共14名手無寸鐵的平民當場被射殺身亡...每次聽到U2的這首歌都有一種恐懼的氛圍...

There's many lost, but tell me who has won?

urls.description: Music video by U2 performing Sunday Bloody Sunday. (C) 2006 Universal-Island Records Ltd.
urls.title: U2 - Sunday Bloody Sunday

forum.title: 血腥星期日
